summary: Work is a concept that can be transformed into an engaging and playful experience. It encompasses the idea of finding purpose, creating a fun environment, and approaching tasks with a spirit of experimentation and fearlessness. This approach encourages breaking and rebuilding ideas, tracking progress like a game, and fostering team growth. By reframing work as an adventure, it becomes a collaborative journey of continuous improvement and achievement, blending elements of purpose, values, impact, and fun. This perspective aims to boost motivation, focus, and personal growth while maintaining a safe and supportive atmosphere.
excerpt: Play To Work transforms your job into an engaging adventure. Start by defining your purpose, then create a playful environment. Experiment fearlessly, breaking and rebuilding ideas. Track progress like a game, keeping score to boost motivation.
